diewald_fluid
Class Fluid2D

java.lang.Object
  diewald_fluid.Fluid2D
Direct Known Subclasses:
Fluid2D_CPU, Fluid2D_GPU
public abstract class Fluid2D
extends Object

this class handles all the parameters of the fluid (CPU / GPU version).

Author:
Thomas Diewald

isInsideGrid

public final boolean isInsideGrid(int x,
                                  int y)
isInsideGrid() this can be used, to check if the given position (x and y) is actually on the fluid grid, which has usually a smaller resolution than the actual frame.
